Package scheduler.dao

Interface CustomerDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DBCustomer
    public interface CustomerDAO
    Interface for retrieving Customer data from the database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      • getAllCustomers

        java.util.List<Customer> getAllCustomers()
        Retrieves all customers from the database.
        Returns:
        the list of all customers

        Customer getCustomer​(int id)
        Retrieves a customer from the database with a specific id.

        Returns:
        the customer with the id

      • createCustomer

        boolean createCustomer​(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String address,
                       java.lang.String postalCode,
                       java.lang.String phone,
                       Division division)
        Creates a customer in the database.
        Parameters:
        name - the name
        address - the address
        postalCode - the postal code
        phone - the phone number
        division - the first-level division
        Returns:
        true if the creation of the customer is successful

      • updateCustomer

        boolean updateCustomer​(Customer customer)
        Updates the customer in the database.
        Parameters:
        customer - the updated customer
        Returns:
        true if the update was successful

      • deleteCustomer

        boolean deleteCustomer​(int id)
        Deletes the customer from the database with the specified id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the customer to delete
        Returns:
        true if the delete is successful

      • deleteCustomer

        default boolean deleteCustomer​(Customer customer)
        Deletes the customer from the database.
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer to be deleted
        Returns:
        true if the delete is successful
